participant_1.background:
I traveled to Asia and Europe to learn new cooking techniques and share my food with new people.
I try to look my best when I go out, but I don't stress out about it too much.
i like anime shows.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
my favorite drink is dr pepper.

participant_2.background:
I remember my father coming home at night after a long shift and telling me stories about his day.
i love to go to the lake.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I comfort myself with my dolls.
my parents were scientists.

content.text: Hello!  What do you like to do for fun?
Hi!  I like to go to the lake or the beach.  How about you?
I love to cook, and I've been to Asia and Europe to learn new cooking techniques.  I also like to travel and share my food with new people.  I like anime shows as well.  What are your interests?
I love that!  I wish I could cook better, but I'm not very good at it.  I love to read and write, and I'm a huge fan of anime shows.  I also love going to the beach and relaxing.
I love to read as well!  I have a blog where I share my thoughts and opinions on different topics.  I'm also a fan of anime.  What's your favorite anime?
I like a lot of different anime, but my favorite is "Fullmetal Alchemist."  I also like "Death Note" and "Code Geass."  What about you?
My favorite anime is "Gintama."  I also like "Naruto" and "Bleach."  I'm a big fan of shounen anime.
I've heard good things about "Gintama."  I'll have to check it out.  I'm not sure what shounen anime is.
Shounen anime is anime that is aimed at young boys.  It usually has a lot of action and adventure.  Some of the most popular shounen anime are "Naruto," "Bleach," "One Piece," and "Dragon Ball Z."
I'll have to check those out!  Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!  I'm always happy to recommend anime.
